RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 28 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Consid ered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ULTRA DIVA a step slow through the turn raced five wide down the lane getting up with a late burst at mid track. HOLLY ROLLER pressed the pace through the turn extending into upper stretch vying all out between horses late. MAGNIFICENT MADDY pressed the pace through the turn gaining the lead on the inside of rivals in upper stretch unable to hold on late. HANDSOME JOANIE slow early lost ground to upper stretch edging closer late in the eight path. REAL APPEAL hesitated at the break giving an inside effort after. CHARITABLE ANY pressed the pace to mid turn then weakened wide down the lane. MACHEN REIGNS was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ultra Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 5 wide lane, quick finish mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Real Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated break, inside effort

ENTRY.NAME: Magnificent Maddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, led inisde, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: Handsome Joanie
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, edged closer late 8 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Holly Roller
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, between late, out gamed

ENTRY.NAME: Charitable Any
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Machen Reigns
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 28, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHADOW SURPRISE sent clear held daylight through the turn angling to mid track in upper stretch holding firm to wire. QUAD EIGHTS chased the pace extending along the inside down the lane being held at bay late. GEMO raced evenly through the turn vying from the four path down the lane needing more late. JERSEY DIAMOND chased through the turn racing evenly in the six path down the lane. BARRY KARAFIN BETS weakened in upper stretch. BOO BE RIGHT was never involved. IMISSBAYMEADOWS bobbled at the break. PLEA BARGAIN was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Surprise
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, held daylight to lane, angled mid track, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Plea Bargain
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended inside lane, held at bay

ENTRY.NAME: Gemo
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Imissbaymeadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Barry Karafin Bets
ENTRY.COMMENT: weakened upper stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, evenly 6 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Boo Be Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 28, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANELITA tracked evenly through the turn losing ground to upper stretch rallying up late six wide. COACH MACHEN stalked the pace through the turn engaging to wrest a short lead in upper stretch ceding late to outside pressure. BELLA BASORA slow early lost ground to upper stretch gaining late seven wide. LITTLE MISS CAT hustled on a clear lead through the turn was hooked in upper stretch wearing out under pressure. GOLDEN LASSIE a step slow through the turn gained modestly along the inside in upper stretch leveling off late. FLAT OUT APPEALING gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Miss Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled clear, hooked upper stretch, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: Canelita
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, wide to lane, rallied up late six path

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Lassie
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, mild gain inside to lane, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Out Appealing
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Machen
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged top lane, led til late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Basora
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost gro8und to lane, gained late 7 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLYUNDERTHEGRAYDAR set the pace through the turn staying off the inside to upper stretch digging in from the three path holding under outside pressure late. UNYIELDING tracked the pace vying four deep down the lane pressing the winner to the wire. HEARTNESS chased between horses to upper stretch extending there in the two path hanging late. GOTTAGETITBACK chased the pace saving ground to upper stretch weakening late along the rail. KICKSTARTER chased early then faded to upper stretch. VIOLENT PASS was always outrun. HIDING THE BRICK was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Flyunderthegraydar
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, kept off inside, three path lane, held off rival

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Heartness
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between horses, extended lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Kickstarter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, faded into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hiding the Brick
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Unyielding
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, vied four deep lane, pressed at wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 28 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races No t Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOGNO DI CAMPIONE (CHI) set the pace on a short lead through the turn kicking clear to a dominant position in upper stretch being kept to a drive as much the best. AMICUS BRIEF saved ground pursuing through the turn angling out in upper stretch being hooked in a place duel responding gamely late. SPEIGHTY WAR came out at the break, rushed to regroup pressed through the turn engaging in a place duel down the stretch battling to the end. LEAD OFF broke slowly angling out early saving ground through the turn then down the stretch posing no menace. BANKX TURBO hustled along pursued through the turn weakening in upper stretch. TURBINADO was carried out at the break.

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, saved ground, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Amicus Brief
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, chased turn, angled out lane, hung tough for place

ENTRY.NAME: Bankx Turbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased through the turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sogno Di Campione (CHI)
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, kicked clear top lane, too good for these

ENTRY.NAME: Speighty War
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out at break, hustled to press through turn, dueled place

ENTRY.NAME: Turbinado
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out at the break

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 28, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claimin g Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALILEO'S AFFAIR raced evenly through the backside emerging off a loose leader in upper stretch surging steadily the final sixteenth getting up in time. MARIPOSA D'ORO sent clear set the pace drawing off along the inside in upper stretch being run down in the last yards. CODAS HONOR slow early lagged to upper stretch mustering a mild rally there to pick up the others. GRAND VENUS a step slow through the turn gave an even finish. VIVE EL MOMENTO was never involved. FLECK dropped well back early. TURN TO ME SUCREE stalked the pace through the far turn then wilted abruptly in upper stretch.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, picked up the others

ENTRY.NAME: Mariposa d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, drew off top lane, run down last yards

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, emerged top lane, surged late, up in tme

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Venus
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Fleck
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early

ENTRY.NAME: Turn to Me Sucree
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, wilted top lane

(Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)( W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHUTUPANDSHAKEIT pressed early clearing on the turn moving off in upper stretch being ridden out. MIND YOUR OWN pressed early then chased through the turn being dispatched in upper stretch continuing on a clear second best. CHARGINA slow early raced evenly down the lane as no menace. JAMESTOWN ROAD played no factor. COURTED trailed throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early then chased on turn, no match lane, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 28, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWERS FOR LISA pressed the pace through the backside shaking clear on the turn widening along the inside in upper stretch hanging on late. PARADE GRAND pressed the pace chasing to upper stretch coming again with a late surge abreast rival. ROSAS WAY slow early lagged to upper stretch responding there to close late. TODAY MATTERS off slowly lagged to the far turn racing wide into upper stretch finding best stride after the fact. LEMON BLITZ tracked evenly through the far turn weakening in upper stretch. CAPTAIN RILEY raced mid pack moving evenly into upper stretch fading late. OLA QUE TAL was never involved. SAINT SCOTTY played no factor. TRIBULATION hustled along gave way on the far turn. PER RULING #83 FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, TODAY MATTERS WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM 4th TO UNPLACED DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased to lane, surged late, pressed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Blitz
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, evenly to lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Today Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, trailed to far turn, wide lane, best stride too late

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, best stride late,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear far turn, widened inside lane, held on
